page.title: 16LEE MOOR VILLAGE-JOHN'S DAY.
page.content: John works as a welfare officer for the English China Clays Company and is also a minister of the Anglican mission church.John gets up at about 6.30. a.m. and makes a hot drink for himself and his wife.John's wife goes to work at about 7.30.On two of the days John takes her to work by car.From 7.45 to 8.45 John is involved with the spiritual worship of the church.After this John goes to work. Because of the nature of John's job his day is unpredictable.John usually prepares the evening meal,which he and his wife eat at about 5.30.p.m. Normally John would hope to go to bed at about 10.00 , after having done more work to do with the church. Being a minister John is often called out at all hours of the night to help people in need.
